function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to airborne transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Ensure adequate outdoor air supply rates and consider additional risk reduction measures","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"Occupants, visitors, and workers in indoor environments","Owner":"Building owners, facilities managers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of implementation of additional risk reduction measures","Impact":"Higher risk of airborne and other transmission routes of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implement additional measures such as hand hygiene, face coverings, and social distancing","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV germicidal irradiation, filtration systems","People":"Occupants, visitors, and workers in indoor environments","Owner":"Building owners, facilities managers, and public health authorities"}]}
